title: DOUBLE-BREASTED COAT WITH FLORAL EMBROIDERY
desc: Double-breasted, straight-cut coat in wool-blend fabric. This model features a decorative, thread-embroidered floral motif under the pockets.• Regular fit• Double-breasted closure with buttons• Welt pockets at the front• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size 40
